entry.title: Update time in Windows 10
entry.content:
Update Time in Windows 10

Sometimes the clock in Windows get in the wrong timezone and updating it manually sometimes doesn't stick.

To update the time in Windows restart the Windows Time service.
entry.summary: Sometimes the clock in Windows get in the wrong timezone and updating it manually sometimes doesn't stick.

entry.title: Delete files older than a certain age in HP-UX
entry.content:
Delete files older than a certain age in HP-UX

I've only tested this on a HP-UX v11.3 box, but I believe that this should work on any *nix system.

Make a log file of all files that are going to be deleted.

find . -name "example" -mtime +30 -exec ll {} \; > report.log

Command Meaning
find the find command
. Searching in the current directory
-name "example" search by filename
-mtime +30 if the modified time is older than 30 days
-exec ll for each item found print it's LL
{} \; This is the end portion to the find command
> report.log print each LL to this log file

Delete those files

find . -name "example" -mtime +30 -exec rm {} \;

References

Gugulethu Ncube guguncube.com
entry.summary: I've only tested this on a HP-UX v11.3 box, but I believe that this should work on any *nix system.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
This is my first post!

This is going to become my online notebook where I'll make notes. Mostly this will start as a place for me to jot down things that I learn so that I remember them in the future. I hope that others might find it helpful too.
